definition: relating to or consisting of or producing or resembling milk, any of the lymphatic vessels that convey chyle from the small intestine to the thoracic duct
details:
adjective
- relating to or consisting of or producing or resembling milk
= example: relating to or consisting of or producing or resembling milk
noun
- any of the lymphatic vessels that convey chyle from the small intestine to the thoracic duct
